name: The Crow & The Fox
description:
The Crow & The Fox
For this jam I wanted to create an interpretation
of the fable of Jean De La Fontaine: "The crow and the fox".

It's my first "game" on Bitsy so I hope you'll like the atmosphere ^^

How to play
Arrow keys (or swipe on mobile) to move and interact

Credits
- Bitsy HD hack by Fred Bednarski
- Image to Bitsy HD by synth_ruiner
- The typeface of the title and ending is PicNic from Velvetyne by Marielle Nils
